name: Core_PixelFormat
description: An enumeration of pixel formats.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Abgr8
description: Four Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.</br>
The second value denotes the intensity of the blue component,</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the fourth value denotes the intensity of the red component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.</br>

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Al8
description: Two Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.</br>
The second value denotes the intensity of the luminance component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates the least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates the greatest intensity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Argb8
description: Four Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.</br>
The second value denotes the intensity of the red component,</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the fourth value denotes the intensity of the blue component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Bgr8
description: Three Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the blue component,</br>
the second value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the red component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Bgra8
description: Four Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the blue component,</br>
the second value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the red component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.</br>
The fourth value denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.</br>

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_L8
description: One Core_Natural8 value.</br>
The value denotes the intensity of the luminance component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_La8
description: Two Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the luminance component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates the least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates the greatest intensity.</br>
The second value denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Rgb8
description: Three Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the red component,</br>
the second value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the blue component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.

elements.name: Core_PixelFormat_Rgba8
description: Four Core_Natural8 values layed out consecutively in memory.</br>
The first value denotes the intensity of the red component,</br>
the second value denotes the intensity of the green component, and</br>
the third value denotes the intensity of the blue component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates least intensity.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates greatest intensity.</br>
The fourth component denotes the intensity of the alpha component.</br>
A component value of 0 indicates full transparency.</br>
A component value of 255 indicates full opacity.
